akn:section.akn:heading: Federal exemption from State water laws

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 1021. Federal exemption from State water laws Nothing in this chapter shall constitute an express or implied claim or denial on the part of the Federal Government as to its exemption from State water laws. (Pub. L. 91–581, § 22, Dec. 24, 1970, 84 Stat. 1573; Pub. L. 109–58, title II, § 236(20), Aug. 8, 2005, 119 Stat. 673.)
Editorial Notes Amendments2005—Pub. L. 109–58 inserted section catchline.
